customer.body:
Dear [AUTHORNAME],
I wish to introduce myself as Nathiya, the production assistant for [JOURNALTITLE]
Article ID: [ARTICLEID]
Article Title: [AUTHORTITLE]
Unfortunately we have not received your corrections for this article so we are unable to proceed with the revised proofs.
We would be grateful if you could send your corrections by Monday, or let us know if this will not be possible for any reason.
Thank you very much for your help,
Best Wishes
Nathiya
Nathiya T.
Production Assistant - Journals
Datapage Tel: +91 8754574275
Web: www.datapage.ie
